name: iShares U.S. Aerospace & Defense ETF
description: The iShares U.S. Aerospace & Defense ETF (IAK) aims to track the investment results of an index composed of U.S. equities in the aerospace and defense sector. Launched in 2006, this exchange-traded fund provides investors with exposure to companies that are primarily involved in the production of aerospace and defense equipment, including manufacturers of aircraft, spacecraft, and defense systems. The ETF is designed for investors looking to capitalize on the growth of the aerospace and defense industries, which are driven by factors such as national security concerns, technological advancements, and increased defense spending by governments globally. IAK offers a diversified portfolio, including large-cap companies such as Boeing and Lockheed Martin, as well as mid-cap firms in the sector. With a focus on sustainability and innovation, the fund also provides insights into companies that are investing in next-generation technologies like unmanned aerial vehicles (UAVs) and cybersecurity solutions. IAK is an appealing option for investors seeking to diversify their holdings while gaining targeted exposure to the dynamics of the aerospace and defense markets, which can often perform well in times of geopolitical uncertainty.

key_executives.name: Matt Tucker
key_executives.position: Head of iShares Fixed Income Strategy

key_executives.name: Salim Ramji
key_executives.position: Global Head of iShares and Index Investments

seo.meta_description: Invest in the iShares U.S. Aerospace & Defense ETF (IAK) to gain exposure to U.S. companies in the aerospace and defense sectors. Explore investment opportunities in this dynamic market.

faq.question: What does IAK invest in?
faq.answer: IAK invests in U.S. companies in the aerospace and defense sectors.

faq.question: What are the main holdings in IAK?
faq.answer: Main holdings in IAK include companies like Boeing and Lockheed Martin.

faq.question: How can I invest in IAK?
faq.answer: You can invest in IAK through a brokerage account that offers trading in ETFs.
